name: Super Panda Wonderland: Ninja Style Adventure
name_original: Super Panda Wonderland: Ninja Style Adventure
description:
Super Panda Wonderland is a fun and addictive game that brings the gaming experience of retro consoles right to your fingertips!

Help the super panda collect as many coins as he can so that you can unlock new characters and new levels. The better you get, the more game play you'll be able to use!

5 fun characters to choose from
4 beautiful and challenging levels
Game Center enabled!

And much more! We hope you enjoy this game :)
